column3: I have a patch for ConnectBlock() which is also a few lines. Should I push it here as well?\n
Since ConnectBlock() is trivial enough and the PR is still recent, I would say we're still on time to slightly increase the scope of this PR with an additional commit.\n@laanwj thoughts?\n
@jtimon fine with me. As I said in #7876, I prefer bundling changes that are easy to review like this one.\n
